name: Into The Deep
description:
INTRODUCTION
Into The Deep is a Metroidvania style Platformer Adventure about a girl who has been separated from her brother while adventuring and looking for loot

GAMEPLAY
In terms of gameplay it plays like a traditional platformer encouraging exploration with minimal focus combat and puzzle solving

CONTROLS
ESCAPE for Menu
SHIFT to run
WASD to move
SCROLL to change active item
LEFT CLICK to use item
SPACE secondary jump won't grab Ladders

 Clarity 

 A. R. Ammons 

After the event the rockslide
realized,
in a still diversity of completion,
grain and fissure,
declivity
&
force of upheaval,
whether rain slippage,
ice crawl, root
explosion or
stream erosive undercut:

well I said it is a pity:
one swath of sight will never
be the same: nonetheless,
this
shambles has
relived a bind, a taut of twist,
revealing streaks &
scores of knowledge
now obvious and quiet.

SFX either made by me or gathered from http://www.freesfx.co.uk/
